shadow.field: // Built-in variables: app, v3d, puzzles, VARS, PROC function setData(){ try { let jsonDataElement = fetchData(); console.log(jsonDataElement); VARS.x = jsonDataElement; } catch (error) { console.log('ERROR'); // Handle error if necessary } } function fetchData() { return fetch("http://localhost:90/api/inventario/ubicacion/"+VARS.ubicacion) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { let j; let jsonDataElement = ``; // Initialize with the opening tag for (let i = 0; i < data.data.length; i++) { j = 0; Object.values(data.data[i]).forEach((element) => { if (j == 0){ jsonDataElement += `${element}`; } if (j == 1){ jsonDataElement += `${element}`; } if (j == 2){ jsonDataElement += `${element}`; } if (j == 3){ jsonDataElement += `${element}`; } j+1; }); jsonDataElement += ``; // Add closing tag and opening tag for the next row } jsonDataElement += ``; // Add closing tag for the last row return jsonDataElement; // Resolve the Promise with the complete HTML structure }) .catch((error) => { console.log("ERROR:", error); throw error; // Propagate the error by throwing it }); } setData();
